short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Differentiate between QA and Prod servers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for devOps people to visually differentiate between QA and Production servers based on url pattern. Top banner/bar will be automatically changed to Red and Green for prod and QA servers respectively. 

Supported DevOps server technologies:
- Jenkins (https://www.jenkins.io/)
